Package com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces

Interface ICandi.IBuilder

  • Enclosing interface:
    ICandi
    public static interface ICandi.IBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ICandi.ILanguage build​(java.lang.String sLanguageName)
      Returns an ILanguage instance for passed language or null if there is no way to create an ILanguage instance.

      It tries to load the language definition from the MSP "config.json" file.
      ICandi.ILanguage buildUsing​(java.lang.String sJSON_LangDef)
      Creates a new ILanguage using passed language definition JSON String (as it appears in "config.json" MSP file).

      If passed parameter is not valid JSON a MingleException is thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        ICandi.ILanguage build​(java.lang.String sLanguageName)
        Returns an ILanguage instance for passed language or null if there is no way to create an ILanguage instance.

        It tries to load the language definition from the MSP "config.json" file. If file is not found in default folder or the file does not have the appropriate entry ("languages") or the entry is not valid JSON, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        sLanguageName - Language name to be created.
        Returns:
        Returns an ILanguage instance for passed language.
        Throws:
        MingleException - If there was an error instantiating the builder.

      • buildUsing

        ICandi.ILanguage buildUsing​(java.lang.String sJSON_LangDef)
        Creates a new ILanguage using passed language definition JSON String (as it appears in "config.json" MSP file).

        If passed parameter is not valid JSON a MingleException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        sJSON_LangDef - sJSON_LangDef JSON String with the language building definition.
        Returns:
        The appropriate ILanguage.
        Throws:
        MingleException - If there was an error instantiating the builder.
